title: Compare graphs of a function and its derivatives

content.question: Three graphs labeled I, II, and III are shown above. One is the graph of f, one is the graph of f’, and one is the graph of f’’. Which of the following correctly identifies each of the three graphs?

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
